name: Ultra Trail Racer
description:
The Big Idea:

Drive on a race track of your own creation! Make it technical with tight switchbacks or high speed straights, what you imagine you can create!

Current State:

The game right now has a menu and a barebones editor with testing. The editor at this point has no Save features. XBOX controller is required.

Controls:

The D-Pad is used for navigation of menus. In the editor, Up/Down changes the Set of editing types and Left/Right changes the Editing Options. X/Y decrease/increase elevation. Left/Right Bumpers decrease/increase values in specific Editing Options. A is Submit. B is Cancel. The Analog sticks are used for moving the camera around and the Triggers are used for zoom.

Drive mode can be activated/deactivated with Start button and the Back button resets the car. X/Y decrease/increase gears i.e. Reverse, Neutral, 1st-4th Gear. Triggers are used for throttle and brakes.
